page.title: 05N.HUISH CLUBS GROUPS & WORK.
page.content: Most women belong to the{WOMENS {INSTITUTE,}which as well as providing a much-needed outlet for them, also helps other organisations and individuals, and subscribes to various charities. There is also the {Mothers {Union}attached to the Church. Avonwick, 2 miles distant, has a { Young Farmers' Club and a local Football Team has members drawn from surrounding areas. The Diptford & North Huish History Society has about 30 members, including a Committee of 8. The Committee and 2 "Ordinary" members are responsible for this effort for THE NEW DOMESDAY. {. } {EMPLOYMENT}is mainly Agricultural but some of the newer residents commute to nearby towns, such as Totnes & Plymouth to work in Shops, Offices & factories.
